name: Toaster Treasure
description:
Dano awakens in his room and is startled to realize that his precious toaster has been stolen.  Can he overcome his adversities to get it back?  Will he collect all the treasure to satisfy the menacing Luko? All he wanted was a piece of toast, now he needs to prove how badly he wanted it.

...................................................................................................................................................................

Toaster Treasure is a 2D Metroidvania style of game, where you need to collect different chests, items and coins in order to progress.  

...................................................................................................................................................................

Controls:

...................................................................................................................................................................

We hope you enjoy our game! It represents roughly 33hrs of programming and 33hrs of art over the course of 10 days.

-BluePinStudio
